about_the_game:
Supporter pack for those who wish to support the developer of Tap Ninja.

Includes:

  • 700 Amber
  • Permanent VIP status
detailed_description:
Supporter pack for those who wish to support the developer of Tap Ninja.

Includes:

  • 700 Amber
  • Permanent VIP status

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 10.10+, Mint 17.1+
  • Processor: Intel Dual-Core Duo 2.6GHz or faster processor
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.6
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Storage: 150 MB available space

name: Tap Ninja - Supporter Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows Vista, 7, 8, or 10
  • Processor: Intel Dual-Core Duo 2.6GHz or faster processor
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Supporter pack | Includes: 700 Amber and a Permanent VIP status!
supported_languages: English, French, German, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese, Russian, Greek, Thai, Norwegian, Portuguese - Portugal, Swedish, Vietnamese, Finnish, Romanian, Polish, Hungarian, Spanish - Latin America, Dutch, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Hindi, Indonesian, Latvian, Serbian, Arabic, Hebrew
